title: SKT T1 Zyra Ability Animations
body: I was disappointed to find that she didn't have animations for her abilities and that was my fault but does riot not plan on adding it? If there are ability animations, they aren't noticeable. Will they add in animations because if you look at her splash art and see that her plant is gem like, that would be awesome to be in the game. {{champion:143}} .

replies.body: It's a 750 RP skin, it's only supposed to look cool, not change abilities! Zeds only ability change is his Q, because throwing the same throwing star as classic skin doesn't fit the skin style.
